mapper.select: select id, board_id, project_no, start_date, end_date, complete, title, _order, (select COUNT(*) from subtask WHERE task_id = task.id) as sub_task_count from task WHERE board_id = #{board_id} ORDER BY _order
select * from task t left join task_member tm on t.id = tm.task_id WHERE complete = false AND tm.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY reg_datetime, end_date
select * from task t left join task_member tm on t.id = tm.task_id WHERE complete = true AND tm.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY reg_datetime, completed_datetime
select * from task t left join task_member tm on t.id = tm.task_id WHERE complete = false AND end_date < CURDATE() AND tm.member_no = #{member_no} ORDER BY reg_datetime, end_date
mapper.update: update task SET complete = !complete, completed_datetime = IF(complete, now(), null) WHERE id = #{task_id}
mapper.insert: insert into task(id, board_id, project_no, start_date, end_date, title, description, _order, reg_datetime, updated_datetime) VALUES (#{id}, #{board_id}, #{project_no}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{title}, #{description}, #{_order}, now(), now())
